name: Akamai (Rimaito, BoBomann18)
description:
In a not so far future at a not so far place. In a time where a super AI was elected as the president. In a world where everybody only does what their leader says because the AI is never wrong.
There is a man who just doesn't fit in. If the AI only wants what is best for the citizen, then why is the first law in the constitution to never turn it off? Why are robots appearing everywhere that try to profile every human around them, and why does this just feel so wrong?
Accompany our unnamed hero who tries to set an end to all of this and risks even becoming a criminal which could face a hard trial.

Controls

W, A, S, D: Move around the map.
E: Interact with buttons and pick up boxes
Space: Do a dash

Note

We recommend downloading the game instead of running it in the browser to increase performance.
